glsa.title: IPsec-Tools: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: IPsec-Tools contains a vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to crash the IPsec tunnel.

background.p: IPsec-Tools is a port of KAME's implementation of the IPsec utilities. It contains a collection of network monitoring tools, including racoon, ping, and ping6.

description.p: The isakmp_info_recv() function in src/racoon/isakmp_inf.c does not always check that DELETE (ISAKMP_NPTYPE_D) and NOTIFY (ISAKMP_NPTYPE_N) packets are encrypted.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted IPsec message to one of the two peers during the beginning of phase 1, resulting in the termination of the IPsec exchange.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
